about.summary: Python package for working with staggered gridded data.

name: pysgrid
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "0.3.1" %}

package:
    name: pysgrid
    version: {{ version }}

source:
    fn: v{{ version }}.tar.gz
    url: https://github.com/sgrid/pysgrid/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
    sha256: 63b07ef0c2acf4c949e6c362d70f8ff024434f819691fe6895fe475267dd1aab

build:
    number: 0
    script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
    build:
        - python
        - setuptools
    run:
        - python
        - numpy
        - netcdf4
        - cell_tree2d

test:
    imports:
        - pysgrid

about:
    home: https://github.com/sgrid/pysgrid
    license: BSD 3-Clause
    summary: 'Python package for working with staggered gridded data.'

extra:
    recipe-maintainers:
        - ayan-usgs
        - ocefpaf
